Title: Nintendo Switch Diagnostic Service
Body (HTML):
Nintendo Switch Diagnostic Service

 

The Nintendo Switch has great build quality and design, but it isn't invincible. Since your device is of little use when broken, it's a good idea to bring it to iFixYouri for expert Diagnostic Service.

 

Each device has its own lifespan - some devices use higher quality components than others and can last years if properly maintained. Drops, water or liquid, even a jolt can damage your device.

 

*NOTE: If you decline repairs for diagnostic or water damage treatment or your device is deemed non-repairable, you will be responsible for shipping and handling.

This is the service you need if you aren't quite sure what the problem with your Nintendo Switch is. We'll find out what is going on, and contact you with a repair quote.

 

We begin every repair service with a series of diagnostic tests to determine what the problem is. Our technicians use their extensive repair experience to swiftly diagnose the problem. It is important to note that most repairs are minor, however, if we notice more damage to your Nintendo Switch, we will contact you prior to carrying out further repairs.

Shipping Your Nintendo Switch

Additional shipping protection and faster shipping options are available during checkout. Thatï¿½s all up to you. You don't need to send us its charging cables, cases, or other accessories. We have plenty here already! The Nintendo Switch should be packaged in a secure box and the label should be affixed.

Questions?

If you have specific questions about Diagnostic Service or any Nintendo Switch service from iFixYouri, please ask them in the box below. Contact customer service with any questions at 888-494-4349 or support@ifixyouri.com.

Title: Nintendo Switch Battery Replacement
Body (HTML):
Nintendo Switch Battery Replacement

 

iFixYouri understands how important your Nintendo Switch is to you, and how unfortunate it is to find it broken. If you need Battery Replacement from a team of reliable and professional technicians, look no further than iFixYouri.

Old or bad batteries can really be frustrating. You might need Battery Replacement if your battery does not hold charge well or charges very slowly or barely at all.

 

A shipping label and email confirmation will be sent to you after checkout. We run diagnostic tests on your phone when it arrives at our repair center to determine if there are any other problems. The Nintendo Switch is thoroughly tested before we ship it back to you. Once the repairs are complete, we provide you with a tracking number to track the shipment back to you!

Shipping Your Nintendo Switch

Use the calculator below to estimate shipping. Please ship your device in a sturdy, secure box. If you hear it rattling around in the box, add some more padding. Please do not include cases, cables, or accessories. Standard shipping is covered by us, as well as $100 insurance. Faster shipping and extra insurance coverage can be purchased during checkout.

iFixYouri Warranty

A 90-day warranty is built into Nintendo Switch Battery Replacement, and it covers everything except accidental damage. We will be happy to assist you if you notice any problems with your device or replacement parts.

Customer Service

Questions about Battery Replacement? Type them into the box below, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. Alternatively, you can reach us at 888-494-4349 or support@ifixyouri.com
